name: Mandoo Plugin
author: Mandoo Team

sections.description: Official Mandoo plugin. This plugin allows you to integrate some features of your account Mandoo in your WordPress admin panel for ease of use. For more information about tools, visit Mandoo
sections.installation:
1. Upload mandoo-plugin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Api Keys section an introduce your Mandoo API keys.
sections.faq:
Â¿It’s necessary a Mandoo Account to use the plugin?

Yes. If yout don’t have a Mandoo ID go to Mandoo and create a Mandoo Account.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • Fix problem with WordPress 4.0 version

1.1.1

  • Changed .pot files name for right recognition

1.1

  • Added information of number of subscribers in each group.
  • Added information notice of number of subscribers when you send a newsletter
  • Added confirm dialog to send a newsletter.
  • Added email background color configuration in newsletters template creation.
  • Added campaign saved for future newsletters shippings.
  • Added creation of simple subscriber group in User Subscribe section when you don’t have any simple group in your Mandoo doMail account.
  • Solved issues with free accounts.
  • Solved issues with translations.

1.0.2

  • Solved issues with translations.

1.0.1

  • Solved issues with translations
  • Solved issues with css and js path

1.0

  • First version.

screenshots.caption: Set up the Mandoo API Keys before use the plugin, becouse is necessary to continue with the plugin configuration. If yout don't have a Mandoo ID go to Mandoo and create a Mandoo Account. Even if you have it go to Api section in Mandoo Account to get the keys.
This is an example of a form list created by Mandoo doForms. This list shows the codes that will be replaced for you form.
In the Widgets section you will have able the Mandoo Widget. With this widget you will show a form created with Mandoo doForm like other widgets on your blog.
